mapper.insert: insert into ecs_supplier_category (cat_id, cat_name, keywords, cat_desc, parent_id, sort_order, template_file, measure_unit, show_in_nav, style, is_show, grade, filter_attr, supplier_id, is_show_cat_pic, cat_pic, cat_pic_url, cat_goods_limit ) values (#{cat_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{cat_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cat_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parent_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{sort_order,jdbcType=BIT}, #{template_file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{measure_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{show_in_nav,jdbcType=BIT}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{is_show,jdbcType=BIT}, #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{filter_attr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_show_cat_pic,jdbcType=BIT}, #{cat_pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cat_pic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cat_goods_limit,jdbcType=SMALLINT} )
mapper.update: update ecs_supplier_category set cat_name = #{cat_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_desc = #{cat_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parent_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, sort_order = #{sort_order,jdbcType=BIT}, template_file = #{template_file,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, measure_unit = #{measure_unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, show_in_nav = #{show_in_nav,jdbcType=BIT}, style = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_show = #{is_show,jdbcType=BIT}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=TINYINT}, filter_attr = #{filter_attr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_id = #{supplier_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_show_cat_pic = #{is_show_cat_pic,jdbcType=BIT}, cat_pic = #{cat_pic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_pic_url = #{cat_pic_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cat_goods_limit = #{cat_goods_limit,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where cat_id = #{cat_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
mapper.select: select cat_id, cat_name, keywords, cat_desc, parent_id, sort_order, template_file, measure_unit, show_in_nav, style, is_show, grade, filter_attr, supplier_id, is_show_cat_pic, cat_pic, cat_pic_url, cat_goods_limit from ecs_supplier_category where cat_id = #{cat_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}
